description: MCP server for searching Korean government procurement bids (나라장터 입찰공고). Search service-type bids, get personalized recommendations, and analyze RFP attachments.

tools.name: get_bids_by_keyword
tools.description: Search Korean government procurement notices (나라장터) for the last 30 days. Returns BOTH regular bid notices (입찰공고) AND preliminary specifications (사전규격) for service-type (용역) projects including consulting, development, and SI.

keyword.description: Search keyword for bid title (공고명). Examples: '인공지능', 'AI', '플랫폼', '시스템 구축', etc.

tools.name: recommend_bids_for_dept
tools.description: Search government procurement notices with department context for personalized recommendations. Returns up to 60 results (30 regular bids + 30 pre-specs) with analysis instructions. LLM can flexibly present Top N items or all relevant items based on user's request. Prioritizes items with non-zero budgets.

department_profile.description: Description of your team/department. Examples: 'UI/UX 디자인팀', 'Database Migration Unit', 'AI/ML 개발팀', '클라우드 인프라팀'

tools.name: analyze_bid_detail
tools.description: Download and extract text from bid attachment (RFP/제안요청서) for strategic analysis. Supports HWP, HWPX, PDF, DOCX, XLSX, and ZIP files. ZIP files are processed with priority: 제안요청서 > 과업지시서 > .hwp > .pdf

department_profile.description: Optional: Your team description for strategic analysis. If provided, response includes analysis prompts for Fit Score, Core Tasks, Winning Strategy, and Risk Factors.

instructions: This server requires a NARA_API_KEY environment variable. Get your API key from https://www.data.go.kr/ by searching for '나라장터 입찰정보' and registering for the BidPublicInfoService.
